name: Scavenger Defense
description:
Scavenger Defense is a tower defense game where you can customize the type of towers you create by combining three separate components into one defending tower. Components are gathered either by collecting them from dead enemies or bought with the scrap that those enemies drop.

 

Each tower has three different components:

Turret, Range Modifier, and an Ammo Modifier.

It is up to you as the player, to decide what combination  best fits the situation

Once you decide what kind of tower you want, place it on the map, and let it defend from the invading forces. After you start the first wave, you won't have down time in between rounds to setup, so think on the fly and use what you have to defeat the enemy waves.
